workflow_description: 1. Login: Enter Admin / admin123 and click Login. 2. PIM: Click 'PIM' menu. 3. Action: Click 'Add Employee', enter First Name 'Resilience' and Last Name 'Agent', then click 'Save'. 4. Verify: Ensure the Personal Details page for the new employee is shown.
goal: Login and create a new employee in OrangeHRM
